languages.text: Пострадавший от Горнила монастырь будет перестроен. Пока из руин возносится собор, благодарные монахи попытаются отыскать в архивах указания на родство святого Когнация с династией фон Валанциус.

The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.
languages.original_text: Пострадавший от Горнила монастырь будет перестроен. Пока из руин возносится собор, благодарные монахи попытаются отыскать в архивах указания на родство святого Когнация с династией фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of Saint Cognatius's relation to the von Valancius dynasty.
The monastery, victim of the Crucible, will be rebuilt. Meanwhile, the monks will begin the process of acknowledging the kinship of Saint Cognatius with the von Valancius line.

The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.
The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. Meanwhile, the monks will begin the process of acknowledging the kinship of Saint Cognatius with the von Valancius line.

The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of Saint Cognatius's relation to the von Valancius dynasty.

The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

languages.text: Le monastère endommagé par le Creuset sera rebâti. Pendant que la cathédrale sera bâtie sur les ruines, les nobles moines fouilleront les archives à la recherche de preuves d'un lien de sang entre Saint Cognatius et la dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Le monastère endommagé par le Creuset sera rebâti. Pendant que la cathédrale sera bâtie sur les ruines, les nobles moines fouilleront les archives à la recherche de preuves d'un lien de sang entre Saint Cognatius et la dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: 坩堝により破壊された修道院は、再建される。大聖堂が廃墟から建てられる間、高貴な修道士たちは、聖コグナティウスとフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の家の間につながりがあったことを示す証拠がないか、書庫を探し回る。
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 坩堝により破壊された修道院は、再建される。大聖堂が廃墟から建てられる間、高貴な修道士たちは、聖コグナティウスとフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の家の間につながりがあったことを示す証拠がないか、書庫を探し回る。

languages.text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院即将重建。在化为废墟的大教堂重建期间，尊贵的修道士们也一直在忙着另一件事——他们在寻找一切可能找到的证据，证明圣科尼亚蒂乌斯与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间存在血缘关系。
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院即将重建。在化为废墟的大教堂重建期间，尊贵的修道士们也一直在忙着另一件事——他们在寻找一切可能找到的证据，证明圣科尼亚蒂乌斯与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间存在血缘关系。

languages.text: El monasterio dañado por el Crisol será reconstruido. Mientras la catedral se erige entre las ruinas, los nobles monjes registrarán sus archivos en busca de cualquier posible relación familiar entre san Cognatius y la dinastía von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: El monasterio dañado por el Crisol será reconstruido. Mientras la catedral se erige entre las ruinas, los nobles monjes registrarán sus archivos en busca de cualquier posible relación familiar entre san Cognatius y la dinastía von Valancius.

languages.text: Das vom Tiegel beschädigte Kloster wird wieder aufgebaut. Während die Kathedrale aus den Ruinen errichtet wird, durchstöbern die noblen Mönche die Archive nach Hinweisen zu einer familiären Verbindung zwischen dem Heiligen Cognatius und der Dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Das vom Tiegel beschädigte Kloster wird wieder aufgebaut. Während die Kathedrale aus den Ruinen errichtet wird, durchstöbern die noblen Mönche die Archive nach Hinweisen zu einer familiären Verbindung zwischen dem Heiligen Cognatius und der Dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: Pota'dan ötürü hasar gören manastır onarılacak. Katedral, yıkıntılarından tekrar inşa edilirken ulu keşişler de kayıtları tarayıp Aziz Cognatius ile von Valancius hanedanlığı arasında ailevi bir bağlantı arayacaktır.
languages.original_text: The monastery damaged by the Crucible will be rebuilt. While the cathedral is being erected from the ruins, the noble monks will scour the archives for any evidence of a familial connection between Saint Cognatius and the von Valancius dynasty.
